name: tonight-nhl-tweetup-nashville
title: Tonight: NHL Tweetup Nashville
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: The Preds may be done for the season, but that doesn’t mean we can’t enjoy the NHL Playoffs! Yet another tweetup will be held tonight, this time specifically for Twittering Preds fans to ring in the 2009 NHL Playoffs together. There will be prizes and other fun, so come hang out. And as for the Preds… Well, there’s always next year.  NHL Tweetup Nashville 5pm-9pm at The Closing Bell Wall St. Pub on Demonbreun  RSVP here  Photo by Scott Ableman.
contentEncoded:
The Preds may be done for the season, but that doesn’t mean we can’t enjoy the NHL Playoffs! Yet another tweetup will be held tonight, this time specifically for Twittering Preds fans to ring in the 2009 NHL Playoffs together. There will be prizes and other fun, so come hang out. And as for the Preds… Well, there’s always next year. 

NHL Tweetup Nashville
5pm-9pm at The Closing Bell Wall St. Pub on Demonbreun 
RSVP here 

Photo by Scott Ableman.
